an@CIBC.com> >; Chandrasekaran, Karthik <Karthik.Chandrasekaran@cibc.com <mailto:Karthik.Chandrasekaran@cibc.com> >; Subramonian, Surya 1 <Surya.Subramonian2@cibc.com <mailto:Surya.Subramonian2@cibc.com> >

Subject: RE: Hvault creation for CBOS devops

 

Hello @Huang, Helen <mailto:Helen.Huang@cibc.com> /@Subramonian, Surya 1 <mailto:Surya.Subramonian2@cibc.com> : 

 

Good Morning. 

 

I am working on the change record. Could one of you please help me with the below values ? 

Scope: {Display Name of your SPN}

Assignment: D-IS0001292-hvaultp-static-spns-AP*

â€¢ Navigate to Identity > App registrations > Search "{Display Name of your SPN} "

â€¢ Roles and administrators > Application Credential Management Administrator > + Add assignment

â€¢ Select member(s) > click "No member selected" > Search "D-IS0001292-hvaultp-static-spns-AP" > Select

â€¢ Next > Enter Justification: {Your Change Request Number}> Assign

 

Regards,

Karan Shah | Consultant, Application Development | Commercial Banking & Payments Technology

81 Bay St., Toronto, ON M5J 0E7 | Work: +1 416-813-9317 | Cell: +1 289-552-1020 | Karan.Shah@cibc.com <mailto:Karan.Shah@cibc.com> 



Our purpose: To help make your ambition a reality

This email message and any attachments are CONFIDENTIAL. If you have received this message in error, please notify us immediately by return email and delete this message and any attachments without disclosing or distributing them further. Thank you.

 

From: Huang, Helen <Helen.Huang@cibc.com <mailto:Helen.Huang@cibc.com> > 
Sent: Thursday, July 03, 2025 4:39 PM
To: Shah, Karan <Karan.Shah@cibc.com <mailto:Karan.Shah@cibc.com> >; Fan, Jing <Jing.Fan@CIBC.com <mailto:Jing.Fan@CIBC.com> >; Chandrasekaran, Karthik <Karthik.Chandrasekaran@cibc.com <mailto:Karthik.Chandrasekaran@cibc.com> >

Subject: RE: Hvault creation for CBOS devops

 

Hi All, 

 

Thanks for your time yesterday! 

 

As discussed, for the Azure SPN, it needs to a custom role ("Application Credential Management Administrator") assignment for HashiCorp Vault to manage its client secret.  Please follow the attached Change Template instructions to create a Change Request for ETS to add this for your ADP1 SPN. 

 

Feel free to let us know if you have any questions. Thanks again,

 

Helen Huang CISSP, P.Eng | Sr. Consultant, Privileged Identity & Access Services | Cybersecurity, Third Party & Resilience (CTPR) | Technology, Infrastructure & Innovation | CIBC 81 Bay St, CIBC Square 19th fl, Toronto, ON, M5J 0E7 | Tel: 289 962-6599 | Helen.Huang@CIBC.com <mailto:Helen.Huang@CIBC.com> 



Our purpose: To help make your ambition a reality

This message, including attachments, is confidential and may be privileged. If you received this in error, please notify me by reply email and delete this message.

 

-----Original Appointment-----

Subject: Hvault creation for CBOS devops
When: July 2, 2025 4:00 PM-5:00 PM (UTC-05:00) Eastern Time (US & Canada).
Where: Microsoft Teams Meeting

Subject: RE: Hvault creation for CBOS devops (NPA0001059)

 

@Shah, Karan <mailto:Karan.Shah@cibc.com>  Please update plan as per below

 

 

1. Remove the custom role "Application Credential Management Administrator" to app and scope access.

 

Scope: D-66538-CBX-DB-AP-01

Assignment: D-IS0001292-hvaultd-static-spns-AP

â€¢ Navigate to Identity > App registrations > Search "D-66538-CBX-DB-AP-01"

â€¢ Roles and administrators > Application Credential Management Administrator > Click â€œD-IS0001292-hvaultd-static-spns-APâ€ > Remove

â€¢ Select member(s) > click "No member selected" > Search "D-IS0001292-hvaultd-static-spns-AP" > Select

â€¢ Next > Enter Justification: {Your Change Request Number}> Assign

 

2. Assign custom role "Application Credential Management Administrator" to app and scope access.

 

Scope: D-66538-CBX-DB-AP-01

Assignment: D-IS0001292-hvaultp-static-spns-AP

â€¢ Navigate to Identity > App registrations > Search "D-66538-CBX-DB-AP-01"

â€¢ Roles and administrators > Application Credential Management Administrator > + Add assignment

â€¢ Select member(s) > click "No member selected" > Search "D-IS0001292-hvaultp-static-spns-AP" > Select

â€¢ Next > Enter Justification: {Your Change Request Number}> Assign

 

 

 

Tan Dinh | Identity Cloud Engineer | Identity â€“ Security, Governance & Tools | Enterprise Shared Services | Employee Technology Services | Technology Operations | CIBC

81 Bay Street â€“ CIBC Square, Toronto, ON  M5J 0E7 | Tel: 416-980-7415 | tan.dinh@cibc.com <mailto:tan.dinh@cibc.com> 

 

Our purpose: To help make your ambition a reality
